p: To evaluate the stability of the experiment, four different concentrations of standards including 10 7, 10 6, 10 4, and 10 3 copies/Î¼L were repeated in triplicate on two separate occasions with a week apart in both intra- and inter-assay as well as negative control. The final coefficient of variation (CV) was calculated. The more stable the data, the smaller the CV value.
